sourcesContent:
import { IProduct } from "../../type"; import './style/index.scss' const ProductCard = ({ brand, model, category, description, discount, id, images, price, rating, stock, thumbnail, title, }: IProduct) => { return (

{brand} {model}

{title}

Price: {price} MDL

{ discount?.value ?

-{ discount?.value}

:null}

{description}

); }; export default ProductCard;
